protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1701
text: Plants were grown at 27ﾺC or 23ﾺC in short days for 4 weeks and the meristem tissue along with young leaves was used for RNA extraction.
(Parameters: start time = 4, time unit = weeks, temperature unit = C, media = Soil). Apices from 25 plants per genotype/treatment were pooled and RNA was extracted

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1702
text: RNA was extracted from 25 pooled shoot apices from corresponding samples using the Qiagen RNA extraction kit

protocol.name: P-MTAB-1703
protocol.text: Plants grown at 23ﾺC or 27ﾺC short days for 4 weeks were carefully dissected and the meristematic tissue along with young leaves was used for RNA extraction and subsequent array hybridisation.
